p: Brain infection was detected in 3 out of 6 mice infected with ZIKV-H or with ZIKV-PR, and in 5 out of 6 mice infected with ZIKV-U. Mean levels of ZIKV RNA showed tendency to be slightly lower in ZIKV-H-infected animals (2.8 × 10 2 copies/10 6 cells) compared to ZIKV-PR (1.6 × 10 4 copies/10 6 cells) and ZIKV-U (1.5 × 10 3 copies/10 6 cells); however, the differences were not significant ( Figure 4C) (ANOVA; F = 1.537; p = 0.2268). These data suggest that immunocompetent mice are a feasible model to study ZIKV infection, including neuroinfection.
